# Pull Request

## Description

Please include a summary of the changes and related context.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Documentation update

## Related Issue

Fixes #(issue number)

## How Has This Been Tested?

Please describe the tests you ran:

- [ ] Tested in development mode
- [ ] Tested in production build
- [ ] Verified on mobile
- [ ] Ran linter (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Ran E2E tests (`npm run test:e2e`)

## Screenshots (if applicable)

Add screenshots for UI changes.

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code for complex logic
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (if needed)
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have tested this works in all major browsers

## Additional Notes

Any other information or context?
